    • Method Detail

      • run

        Fit3D run()
   throws SubstructureSuperimpositionException
        Creates a new Fit3D search and starts calculation.
        Returns:
        A new Fit3D search when finished.
        Throws:
        SubstructureSuperimpositionException

      • rmsdCutoff

        Fit3DBuilder.ParameterStep rmsdCutoff​(double rmsdCutoff)
        Defines the RMSD cutoff up to which matches should be reported. If a Fit3DSiteAlignment is performed this is the cutoff that is used for the internal call of the Fit3D algorithm.
        Parameters:
        rmsdCutoff - The RMSD cutoff up to which alignments should be reported.
        Returns:
        The Fit3DBuilder.ParameterStep that can be used to define optional parameters.

      • distanceTolerance

        Fit3DBuilder.ParameterStep distanceTolerance​(double distanceTolerance)
        Defines the distance tolerance that is accepted when extracting local environments. If a Fit3DSiteAlignment is performed this is the cutoff that is used for the internal call of the Fit3D algorithm.
        Parameters:
        distanceTolerance - The distance tolerance considered when extracting local environments.
        Returns:
        The Fit3DBuilder.ParameterStep that can be used to define optional parameters.

      • statisticalModel

        Fit3DBuilder.ParameterStep statisticalModel​(StatisticalModel statisticalModel)
        Adds the specified StatisticalModel to the search to calculate significance of matches. This may only be used when running a batch alignment. When running individual alignments the instance of the model should be passed to all individual Fit3D runs. After all runs completed call StatisticalModel.calculatePvalues(List)
        Parameters:
        statisticalModel - The StatisticalModel to be used.
        Returns:
        The Fit3DBuilder.BatchParameterStep that can be used to define optional parameters.

      • mapUniProtIdentifiers

        Fit3DBuilder.ParameterStep mapUniProtIdentifiers()
        Enables mapping of each chain of a Fit3DMatch to a UniProtIdentifier using the SIFTS project.
        Returns:
        The Fit3DBuilder.ParameterStep that can be used to define optional parameters.

      • mapPfamIdentifiers

        Fit3DBuilder.ParameterStep mapPfamIdentifiers()
        Enables mapping of each chain of a Fit3DMatch to a PfamIdentifier using the SIFTS project.
        Returns:
        The Fit3DBuilder.ParameterStep that can be used to define optional parameters.

      • mapECNumbers

        Fit3DBuilder.ParameterStep mapECNumbers()
        Enables mapping of each chain of a Fit3DMatch to an ECNumber using the SIFTS project.
        Returns:
        The Fit3DBuilder.ParameterStep that can be used to define optional parameters.

      • filterEnvironments

        Fit3DBuilder.ParameterStep filterEnvironments​(double filterThreshold)
        Enables pre-filtering of extracted environments, i.e. each pair of residues has to have a compatible pair in the environment within distance cutoff.
        Parameters:
        filterThreshold - The threshold used to check the distances in Angstroem.
        Returns:
        The Fit3DBuilder.ParameterStep that can be used to define optional parameters.
